technology: There were no technical difficulties experienced by the participant.
cur_neg_affect: The participant did not disclose any negative affect about the pandemic/masks/vaccine/boosters in the present.
past_neg_affect: The participant disclosed some negative affect about the pandemic/masks/vaccine/boosters when recalling the past, such as missing out on social interactions.
communal_orientation: The participant displayed some behaviors and made some statements that reflected a desire for social connectedness with their conversation partner, such as asking questions and sharing experiences.
engagement: The participant was engaged in the conversation, throwing themselves into the conversation and genuinely conversing with their partner.
defensiveness: The participant was not at all defensive in justifying their beliefs/perspective.

questions.transcript: What was going through your mind at the time?

vaccine_importance: The participant believes that vaccines are extremely important.
booster_importance: The participant believes that boosters are extremely important.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrated a moderate amount of cognitive complexity, considering and analyzing different perspectives in the conversation.
general_notes: The participant is very friendly and open to sharing their experiences.
